text: pachi pavitra mahina pasara thata ja musarikone jyam pana ju'o, katala kari do, te'one kedi banavi lo, temane gheri lo ane temane sodhavani takamam dareka ghati'omam ja'o, ham jo te'o tauba kari le ane namajha padhava lage ane jhakata apava lage, to tame temana marga chodi do, ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala mapha karanara, dayalu che
